title: @Riot, Karma's run animation
body:
I've brought this up multiple times and have yet to receive any response or even acknowledgement. 

My issue is that Karma has only 1 run animation. She has an ability that buffs her move speed and yet she has 1 run animation. Soraka has multiple runs, Ashe has multiple runs. Both were visually updated before Karma. Sivir has like 5 runs which makes sense because of how much move speed changes are in her kit. Ashe has multiple run animations and has zero move speed modifiers in her kit.

Why does Karma only have 1 run animation? She uses E and quickly hops around it's just her run animation sped up. It looks out dated even though she was recently re-released. I don't understand why 4 new models were created but only 1 run animation was made when she has a haste spell built into her kit. ???

:( {{champion:43}} :(

replies.body: Thanks for bringing this up. We've been giving attention to various characters' runs, so this seems like a good thing to focus on. I may even take this on myself, runs are always fun :)

That's nice to hear. Another champion that could use some attention animation wise is Fiora {{champion:114}}. She has a wonky run animation and combined with her pose she looks very stiff.                                                      
I also remember her designers had problems animating her W (she was supposed to use the dagger on her back to block), resulting in her animations feeling lackluster. Is there any chance of revisiting this champ?
Should also mention Sivir's moon run, especially when she has homeguards. Each step is a thousand leagues apart.

Thanks for the reply!

Personally for Karma I wouldn't mind something that is reminiscent of her Kimono days, something more muted with small steps instead of bouncy. But thank you for working on this.

Hah, another thing I could include in my [thread](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/miscellaneous/V1RXWpK9-ironstylus-relaunch-quality) concerning relaunch quality.
I also noticed this and as Karma main (pre and after rework) understand how you feel.

It honestly just doesn't make sense. It feels like they rushed through it or something. I've been playing a lot of Ashe and she has at least 3 distinct movement animations despite not having one ability to change her own move speed

Randomly bumping.
I personally don't care, but apparently others do.

And while you are at it, can you make it so Vel'Koz' homeguard animation flows more smoothly into his regular movement?
It's always so jarring at that moment when homeguard ends.
this needs a bump or something cuz this is long overdue!

Please look into {{champion:2}} s walk/run animation he looks like he is slipping on ice when he walks...
I noticed it recently on howling abyss and it looks so weird.
